summary:
Allows you to continuously chop wood while you make a coffee or run to the corner shop for milk.
To exit wood cutting, simply press any movement key or activate. Currently, only Riverwood chopping blocks are supported but will be adding more and eventually all of them
descriptionHtml:
Allows you to continuously chop wood while you make a coffee or run to the corner shop for milk.
To exit wood cutting, simply press any movement key or activate.

This mod is still being tested and developed.
You may need to start a new character to test it. if you want to use it for an existing character it may not work
Haven\'t noticed many glitches but let me know in detail if you find any.

Check out my other mods and give feedback :)
author: Windrider494
